comment: Take her! Not only does she make the class easy for you she is excited about teaching it too. 3 tests and an optional final. Bonus on every test. Optional homework. Attendance isn't mandatory but recommended since its a math class. Tests are very similar to the unit reviews. If you pay attention its an easy A. Plus she's an adorable old lady.

Verhoeven is the best! She made class super easy for me to understand, and honestly, I feel like I've learned more in this class than in any other class this semester. She's super quirky but that's part of what makes class interesting. Just study the reviews, unit highlights, and HW. Optional final available to replace lowest grade. I made an A
Professor Verhoeven is hilarious! Her tests are fair, and you get to drop your lowest one out of four. Always willing to answer a question, no matter how stupid or silly it is.

She is the best econ teacher I have ever taken. Super easy and hw is optional. The reviews are very similar to the exams and will help a bunch if you know them. I got all As on my 3 exams and didn't take the final because it was optional. Overall great class.

Ive taken penny for three of my business classes. She grades so well and fair- lots of partial credit. if you sorta know what your doing on her tests she will give you a good grade. I made A's on all my tests. She gives a review for each test KNOW IT: its the test.  watch out for cheating! she catches everyone....  TAKE HER!!!!!!!!

Cutest teacher ever! Very passionate about the subject and knows what she's talking about. 3 test with optional final. Go to class and you'll get an A. Test are like the study guide and she gives tons of homework problems you can work for extra practice. Good teacher!

She gives out "unit highlights" for each test which explain the material way better than the book. She is very clear on all the material and will answer any questions you have. Wonderful professor, and I would 100% recommend taking her if you can!

This is my second class I have had with Penny Verhoeven, and she is such a wonderful professor. It is very important to her that her students understand the material, and she is excellent at teaching it. Extremely approachable and friendly. Not to mention adorable and hilarious. There are 3 tests and a final that you can exempt. Forever a favorite!
Love her take her

One of the best teachers. Yes she is easy but she also helps you understand the material. She is every into her teaching and that makes class very enjoyable. If you get the chance to take her, please do, you wont regret it.

Penny is the best!!  She makes stats enjoyable somehow.  there are 3 tests then the final, if you like your grade on the first three you can exempt the final. that's the only grade in the class.  I thought the class was extremely easy.  If you have to take stats take her.

Dr. Verhoeven is an amazing teacher.  She really loves what she does and you can tell.  I took her for Econ 2200 as well and really enjoyed it.  She gives you a packet for each unit that lays out exactly what is going on in the class and then gives out study guides with answers before each test.  The only way to not do well in class is to not try.

Such a great prof. really cares about her students. Gives you a unit packet with everything you need to understand the material. Come to class and study the review. Material can be difficult at times but study hard and put forth the effort. An A is not out of reach.

Mrs. Verhoeven could not of made this class any easier.  People who say she puts stuff on the test that she didn't go over is lying!  She gives you a packet over each unit you are in.  The packet includes all the information you will go over for the test, along with review problems that are almost identical as to what will be on the test.
Did not like this teacher at all. She doesn't explain things well. She put things on test that weren't even covered and most of all she was very rude.

Fantastic professor. Very knowledgeable, funny, and enthusiastic. Also quite helpful if you don't understand something. She knows the work is difficult and boring for most, so she really works to make class as fun and easy as possible. You'll learn a lot in this couse. Attendance is imperative though. You'll fail the tests if you don't go to class.

She is the best stats teacher. I  had to drop econ 2300 on the previous semester cause the prof was so terrible. Took Verhoeven and i love how she makes stats seem easy, i got an A in all tests didn't need to do the final! She is extremely helpful and enthusiastic which helped me remember the material. Take her!

She is a very sweet lady. Gives you formula sheet for every test. Go to class to get a good understanding of material, and you won't need to do much hw for practice. Drops lowest test grade. Great teacher, easy A.

Professor Verhoeven is very scattered when it comes to teaching. She is an elderly woman so she gets all her energy by prancing around the front of the room. Test are difficult STUDY THE UNIT PACKET!!! Her test are short answer, and she is very specific about the answer and will count it all wrong if its not in the proper format.

One of the best professors I've had at KSU! I'v heard horror stories about this class, but it was so easy, I made 100s on all exams. She provides reviews that are similar to the exam that are very helpful. She literally walks you through the information and is very helpful. TAKE HER!
She makes this hard class super easy. Go to class and study the hand out. Easy A
Her class is easy if you go to class and do the homework. easy A

This professor is AMAZING! If math isn't your strong point, take her! She is so helpful and so enthusiastic about teaching. Best math teacher i've had at KSU.  (PS don't buy the book, you wont use it)

A truly excellent professor. She is somewhat scattered and very funny, but she knows what she's talking about and she does a good job explaining the material. Tests are very easy as long as you understand the review. Final is optional.

She is the best teacher i have ever had a Kennesaw State University. I would reccoment her to any student. Go visit her in office hours if you do not understand and she will help you. SHe will remember who you are and really helps your grade. Great teacher.
Terrific teacher! Clear and helpful if you need it. She gives you plenty of material to help you do well in the class. She is very approachable. Highly recommend!

She is GREAT :) Willing to help with any question!! I strongly suggest taking this teacher..She teaches with examples and works through every type of problem on the test. Test Review questions in her unit packets are the key to doing good on the test!!

Very kooky and odd teacher. Definitily has that "mad scientist" vibe going on. Is very knowledgeable and helpful though. Tests are very similar to the study guides she hands out, so just work problems similar to those and you'll be ok. Drops the lowest test grade as well.

Best Stats professor.You HAVE to go to class and study if you want an A. Her tests are fair. She is really good at making you understand the subject. 3 tests, no final, a bonus and she grades 2 tests 40% of grade and 20% on lowest test grade, which helps a lot. Take her.

She is awesome, fair on her tests. You cannot miss a class because the subject is really hard but she knows how to make you understand the subject. You have to study to get an A. Really smart, she knows what she is talking about. She is a funny instructor also, which makes class interesting. No final, 3 tests. I would definitely recommend her.
Teaches class at an even pace and makes stat understandable. Low use of books and tests are similar to handouts. Come to class and you will do fine.

I ended up changing majors, in part, because of this prfessor. Her notes were extremely detiled and often confusing. She spoke extremely fast and was difficult to understand, at times. I honestly don't think she cared at all, about helping any of the students. Most of the time, it seemed she was talking to herself. She didn't let the studentsanswer

Very passionate teacher! She loves teaching and wants you to succeed. Material is tough but she does a great job of explaining it. Provides typed notes. The class basically consists of doing practice problems, which is extremely helpful. Practice exams are very similar to tests. An A is definitely within reach if you put in the time and effort.

Great teacher! Unfortunately the subject matter is difficult, but she does a good job of explaining stuff. She's also willing to help you outside of class. The tests are EXACTLY like her practice exams- master the practice test and you'll make an A. She drops your lowest test score, so it's possible to not take the final.

Took her for both ECON 2300 and 3300 by choice. The material is hard no matter what and homework is definitely necessary. She teaches well though. Very sweet and gives bonus problems - drops lowest test grade. Overall, a great professor!

Hated this class but the professor is ok.I wouldn't recommend taking her but she does know her stuff.  She enjoys teaching but at times moves way too fast.She is willing to help during her office hours but with other classes,you may miss those 2 hrs.lol.Final SUCKS!MUST DO HOMEWORK IN HERE OR YOU WILL FAIL!First day-find some smart study buddies!!

Just don't take her!! Half the class failed the first test and had to drop. Only a couple people got As and most ended up with C's after putting in a lot of work. She is just not worth it and doesn't explain the material very well. Take baker for 3300.

She is a wonderful teacher. She really tries her best to make everyone understand the subject. A lot of people don't do well in her class because everyone is always on their computer instead of listening. If you pay attention, I  know you will do well. I really think she should be given the best professor award. She was awesome and knows her stuff.

very hard class overall. attendance "mandatory" but doesn't help with your grade at all. moves fast. need to study a lot of this class because she won't help you if you are one point away from the next grade level at the end of the semester. believe me i know..it happened to me.
Stay very far away!

Pay close attention in her class...she moves! A very passionate teacher that will keep your attention. 3 tests and an optional final...that's it. Do your homework and practice problems and you will be alright.

LOVE her! she is AMAZING. I am taking her next semester for another class. I understood EVERYTHING she taught in class, tests are similar to practice tests. She provides lots of materials for you to succeed!

Probably the best teacher for this subject. One of those classes that you can't jut breeze through. The material is tough, no matter what. You have to attend every day because everything builds on itself. I attended class almost every day, took notes, paid attention and passed with a B. Trust me. She is probably the best one to take for this class.

It's true. More than half of the class either received an F or D. The subject is hard no matter what. She is a nice woman, but I don't recommend her to anyone if you don't like to attend classes. You must show up for class! She doesn't quite explains thing clearly. She has a Ph.D..so in a way, she teaches at that level.
if you're going to take econ 3300 beware!!!! out of 35 students in the class more than half failed or got a D!!!

I def agree with that comment (5/4/08) and add to that the whole looking at you as if she wanted you to nod agreeing on some point.  Class is hard as crap but she tries for you to do well on it (even though almost 40% of the class failed the tests).  She does give you a study guide that resembles the test very close.

What can I say about this tiny little woman...she smokes a lot! She teaches like a mad scientist and she's really got this whole speaking to herself thing going on. She teaches really well and only gives you 3 tests, final is optional and will replace your lowest test grade. It can only help you, not hurt you. Grade is avg of 3 tests.

Awesome teacher. Sweet as can be!!! Really cares about the students success in her class. Gives you a study guide with problems that are similar to the once on the exam. Very approachable if you have any questions. Highly recomend!!!

The clarity of her class lecture was about as clear as the naked chicks on the unsubscribed spice channel.  She taught with in a nervous "mad scientist" manner, which made it hard to focus.  She gives good study material, but her tests are graded meticuously (even though she constantly revises her errors in her soultions from H.W.)

I hated the subject, but loved the teacher.  If you have to take this course you want to take it with her.  She loves what she does and she really works hard to ensure you pass.  She will work with you as often and as long as needed.  God Bless Her
I agree with the previous posts - she makes it as easy as she possibly can.

She gives very good examples, Statistics is not an easy subject, but she breaks down the equation so anyone can understand them. You still need to study in order to do well, this is not a class you can just show up and expect to pass.

Professor Verhoeven is an outstanding positive and upbeat teacher. She takes difficult subject matter and demonstrates exactly how to use it during class lecture. She assigns homework that reinforces that day’s lecture. If you follow her system, your reward is a good grade in a tough subject. The cl
